pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, April 29, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, April 29, 2018:

Toronto, Ontario

7 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the #TorontoStrong Vigil for those who have been affected by the tragedy in Toronto that took place on Monday, April 23.

Mel Lastman Square
5100 Yonge Street

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
